subject: $59.95 DREAMWEAVER CS3
body:
Once in motion, a pattern tends to stay in motion.

It isn't pollution that's harming the environment. It's the impurities in our air and water that are doing it.

To have what we want is riches but to be able to do without is power.


The end of life is life. Life is action, the use of one's powers. And to use them to their height is our joy of duty.

Still bent to make some port he knows not where, still standing for some false impossible shore.

The Christian ideal has not been tried and found wanting. It has been found difficult and left untried.

Honor is like an island, rugged and without a beach once we have left it, we can never return.

I used to trouble about what life was for -- now being alive seems sufficient reason.

Life is pain and the enjoyment of love is an anesthetic.

I would uphold the law if for no other reason but to protect myself.

Do not on any account attempt to write on both sides of the paper at once.

What men usually ask for when they pray to God is, that two and two may not make four.

Constant success shows us but one side of the world adversity brings out the reverse of the picture.
